Articles.Content:
all in short the storyline is:

a catastrophe has happened on kerbin and all that is left on kerbin is ksc

all 200 kerbals are left homeless

your job is to:

build either one or many ships to transport all 200 kerbals to duna, eve, Laythe or the mun

land them there in housing

and if you have or a life support mod make the base self sufficient

rules

no hyper edit

mechjeb and kos and all other mods

housing mean that that they don't have to stand outside all the time

you can play in careerer but i recommend you do this in sandbox

point system

too the mun we go! - send all 200 kerbals to the mun - 5 points

duna one - send all 200 kerbals to duna - 20 points

beach hut - send all 200 kerbals to Laythe - 20 points

hell on eve - send all 200 kerbals to eve - 30 points

more points to follow

leaderboard

Edited November 16, 2013 by popeter45

Please read the Challenge Submission Guide, your challenge is lacking a points/scoring/winning system.

Also:

- How do you define housing?

- How do you define a mod being OP?

- How do you define being humane?
seems a bit boring mission to transport 200 kerbals to another planets. Even if is nessecary to hold all of them on the same place with housing that will be laggy stuff.
